__e: Have you ever thought, right- I mean, you don't know... but you might already have had the happiest moment in your whole fucking life... and all you've got to look forward to is sickness and purgatory?
And I'm not talking about guns and disease and facial hair... though that was true, too.
Do you just get to the point where it's all about ailments, and medications, and funerals, and who's being diagnosed with what,
There is a family of diseases. It's quite rare.
Oh, that's probably the Center for Disease Control coming to get me with their van.
I mean, with all the diseases and problems out there, who needs it, right?
And their rate of heart disease is far lower than here.
Sometimes when they ask if I wanna donate a dollar for heart disease, I'll say I already gave, but mostly, yes, I tell the truth.
